casebody.data:
Israel C. GELLMAN, Appellant, v. OLIVER MACHINERY CO., Appellee. No. 7099. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Jan. 12, 1937. C. E. Threedy, of Chicago, Ill., and Fred P. Geib, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellant. Liverance & Van Antwerp, of Grand Rapids, Mich., for appellee.

Before MOORMAN, HICKS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

*1000PER CURIAM.

The decree in this cause is affirmed for the reasons stated by the trial court in its opinion of February 8, 1935.
